title: Fat Camp with Jessica Kirson | Sal Vulcano & Chris Distefano Present: Hey Babe! | EP 77
description:
Hey Babe! is a podcast where comedians Chris Distefano and Sal Vulcano share stories and have fun. Let your hair down & come hang out with the BABES!
This week the babes are joined by comedian Jessica Kirson!!! They talk about the time she served at a fat camp upstate. Food is an addiction we all fight. Jordan Peterson attacks Yumi Nu's sports illustrated photoshoot. What defines beauty? Is jenny craig a real person?!? Dieting is hard. Raising kids while fat is IMPOSSIBLE! Nut butter is not allowed near schools anymore. Should we start a No Presh grindr account? Chris needs to stop eating so much red meat. Are aliens real?! They found a door on Mars....is this proof of anything? Are we really alone in the universe? Is being in contact with your kids teacher good or bad?! Why do people shame teachers for being normal people? HEY BABE!
Rate us on iTunes!
https://linktr.ee/Nopreshnetwork
Follow The Show!
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/heybabepod/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/heybabepod
 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
